title: Drawing cute shit. Hit me up.
body:
This style. I wanna draw some goofy shit. Gib idears pls. champs interacting with champs or champs interacting with yourselves only. If yourselves drop pic pls. Describe what you wanna do. If no descriptor i'm rolling a die.
No sex. Dun wan ban.

http://i1289.photobucket.com/albums/b517/tabithaarkramer/AHAHAHA_zpsda54e7fa.gif
